revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Monster AI}} '''A_DragonInitFlight'''
(''no parameter'')
Locates the first thing with the same [[thing ID]] as the calling actor and sets it as the {{c|tracer}} target. If no other thing can be found, then it will jump to the Spawn state. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Dragon}} and derived classes.
